description: This file appears to be a Python script used for generating source code (headers, enums, and RPC stubs) from JSON schema definitions related to JSON-RPC. It contains functions for parsing schemas, generating C++ header files, enums, version info, and stub code, indicating its role in code generation within a larger project.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file declaring the JSON-RPC API, including necessary includes and a header guard.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function to generate classes, enums, version info, stub code, and RPC code based on a given JSON schema, handling file checks and generation logic.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
